transcript: the first person you always have to sell is yourself and most people actually aren't sold if I were to just judge them based on how much they believe in the product that would map significantly more to what their closing percentage was more than anything else conviction itself is not binary it's not do you believe or do you not believe it's how much do you believe but the cool thing is is that because conviction is measurable and it is changeable it's also something that you can work on and you can outwork yourself doubt
